activities: LiveAreaLabs, Inc. (the "Company") is a full-service digital marketing agency and ecommerce system integrator. We specialize in creating flagship digital experiences and offer a range of agency services including branding, user experience design, visual design, copywriting, interactive development, systems integration, analytics, and localization. Personal information is received mainly through our work with client data during technical implementations and support services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: The LiveAreaLabs Safe Harbor Program includes offline, on-line, manually processed personal data. We do not include human resource data at this time.
privacyprograms: LiveAreaLabs is currently using a self-regulatory privacy program that is verified through the LAL EU Safe Harbor team.
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution/American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA)
